question: Who of the following was honoured with the 'Sportsperson of the Year' award at the Telangana Sports Journalists Association annual awards for 2017, Telangana?
explanation: Indian women's cricket team captain Mithali Raj was honoured with the 'Sportsperson of the Year' award at the Telangana Sports Journalists Association annual awards for 2017, in Hyderabad, Telangana. Mithali Raj's parents received the Sportsperson of the Year award on her behalf from BV Papa Rao, Advisor to the Telangana government. The 'best senior male athlete' award was presented to shuttler Kidambi Srikanth by former BCCI president N Shivlal Yadav. The 'best coach of the year' award was given to Pullela Gopichand for the second consecutive time, by former Indian cricketer VVS Laxman.
